title: Is Apple Music more profitable or Spotify? - Quora

response.answer_text: Spotify has not been able to make any money so far and, additionally, has no path forward to do so without major changes. Apple Music is part of Apple’s Services which are hugely profitable and growing, but it’s impossible to know if the service is profitable on its own. It’s likely that it probably breaks even since Apple’s overhead costs are much lower. The fact that Apple has so many products and services means that they can subsidize parts of their ecosystem that make less money on their own. Either way, it’s clear who the winner is here.

Spotify is more profitable because it has more subscribers… One key thing is that Spotify and Apple are too similar at the moment. The well-known music executive Jimmy Iovine said that they must have original content (like Netflix) to attract customers. This means the next phase of growth for both companies requires additional capital… Apple has this capital in abundance, but Spotify does not... Although Spotfiy is more profitable now, it will be a very very different story in 2-3 years time.
